thread.title: REBECCA DISTASIO

author: REBECCA DISTASIO
title: REBECCA DISTASIO
text:
Received 5 flowering pear trees. NO leaves, NO flowers Yet! All had the tops cut off which means I will probably have 2 main trunks on each tree --- one had the roots cut way back.-- I hope it takes -- I will not know how all 5 will grow for some time.--- they have only been in the ground one week.
I planted them the same day I received them.
Your service was great after we cleared up the ordering part.--- ..
